properties.name: signaruteInitText
properties.description: Set the text that will be displayed on signature pad init component if the signature value is undefined

properties.name: validators
properties.description: Array of validator Objects. When multiple validators fail, only one error is displayed, determined by their order in the array. Each Object should have three fields:

subProperty.name: message
subProperty.description: Error message that shown when validation fails

subProperty.name: validator
subProperty.description: Function that takes input value as an argument and returns Boolean

properties.name: name
properties.description: With this property signature will be listening to validation with current value for e.g. 'validateTest'

properties.name: lockSignatureArea
properties.description: With this property set to true signature area will be lock for editing

properties.name: signaturePadPoints
properties.description: Set signature points that were stored

properties.name: signaturePadAreaWidth
properties.description: Set signature pad area width with which signature was stored

events.name: empty
events.description: Emitted when next events are triggering like mouseup, mouseleave or clear button pressed, will return isEmpty status of signature pad

events.name: mouseup
events.description: Emitted when is mouseup event is trigger on signature pad and signature data is not empty and changed state, will return signature pad data value

events.name: mouseleave
events.description: Emitted when is mouseleave event is trigger on signature pad and signature data is not empty and changed state, will return signature pad data value
